We are offering this remarkable opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This is an exclusive offer tailored to recognize your discerning taste and strategic acumen. Should you decide to proceed, we assure you of unparalleled service and support throughout your journey with our product. We look forward to the possibility of working together and hope to see this product enhance your endeavors. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
